entities.name: dursleys
entities.description: The Dursleys are Harry's cruel and neglectful Muggle relatives.

entities.name: sirius black
entities.description: Sirius Black is a wizard and the godfather of Harry Potter. He is mentioned as living with Harry.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is a person who is part of the group walking through the grounds. He is described as having his wand pointed sideways at Pettigrew's chest.

relationships.description: Sirius Black is Harry Potter's godfather and friend.
Lupin has Pettigrew as his hostage, with his wand pointed at him.
